name: Project 2048
description:
A whole new take on the famous brainteaser number game! Swipe & shoot cube to merge with same kind of cube and make bigger one. The cubes don't stay in place — they fall realistically and bounce off each other if you haven’t managed to merge cube!

How to play?
* Move your 3D cube to aim!
* Shoot and hit cubes of the same color and number!
* Combine two identical cubes to get another new cube!
